DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare accuracy EtPCO2 measurement take nasal cannula use Microcap ( Oridion Capnography Inc. , Needham , MA ) micro-stream device TG-920 main-stream device ( Nihon Kohden , Tokyo , Japan ) . Three group non-intubated , spontaneously breathe patient include : 1 ) lean patient without obstructive sleep apnea ( OSA ) ; 2 ) obese patient without OSA ; 3 ) obese patient diagnose OSA . This latter group high prevalence oral breathing . Additionally , test efficacy oral guide , propose compare accuracy EtPCO2 measurement Microcap two different nasal cannula , one ( Smart CapnoLine PlusTM , Oridion Medical , Jerusalem , Israel ) one without ( CapnoLineTM H , Oridion Medical ) oral guide trap gas expire mouth . The TG-920 main-stream system require purpose-designed YG-122T cannula one test Nihon-Kohden product .
DOC.brief_title: Micro-stream Capnography Non-intubated Lean Obese Patients With Without Obstructive Sleep Apnea
DOC.detailed_description: After institutional review board approval inform consent , recruit 60 patient schedule general anesthesia : 20 normal weight patient ( define BMI < 30 kg/m2 ) without diagnosis OSA , 20 obese patient ( BMI > 35 kg/m2 ) without diagnosis OSA , 20 obese patient polysomnography-diagnosed OSA . Patients know severe pulmonary cardiac disease exclude . Protocol Patients give general anesthesia endotracheal intubation laryngeal mask airway . In post-anesthesia care unit , give oxygen nasal cannula . They randomly assign one two capnometers : Microcap ( Oridion Capnography Inc. , Needham , MA ) TG-920 ( Nihon Kohden , Tokyo , Japan ) O2 administer 3 L/min . The order application two capnometers randomize accord computer-generated code keep opaque envelope study begin . The order two nasal cannula Microcap ( Oridion Capnography Inc. , Needham , MA ) also randomize . Thus , patient EtCO2 value measure three condition : Microcap capnometer via Smart CapnoLine PlusTM cannula 3 L/min O2 flow ; Microcap capnometer via CapnoLineTM H cannula 3 L/min O2 flow ; TG-920 capnometer 3 L/min O2 flow . EtCO2 measure 5 minute device cannula . At end 5-min sampling period ( 5 minute start capnometer nasal cannula combination ) , 2-3 ml arterial blood drawn obtain blood gas measurement . This blood sample obtain indwell radial arterial catheter insert pre- , intra- , postoperatively attend anesthesiologist , resident charge case , one investigator . After blood gas sample collect , another capnometer apply procedure repeat . When capnometers cannulas change , patient ask rate comfort level . At begin sample period capnometer nasal cannula combination , Angiocath , connect capnometer , apply nostril presence absence nasal breathe record . The capnometers arterial blood gas analyzer calibrate experiment accord manufacturer 's instruction . Measurements Morphometric demographic characteristic participate patient record . Our major outcome accuracy EtCO2 value capnometer administration 3 L/min O2 non-obese patient without OSA , obese patient without OSA , obese patient OSA . In patient , 5-min application combination capnometer nasal cannula , EtCO2 value measure 5 minute average . These average EtCO2 value set subtract arterial partial pressure carbon dioxide ( PaCO2 ) value measure simultaneously ( GEM Premier 3000 , Instrumentation Laboratory , Lexington , MA ) . At nominal value PaCO2 34 mmHg , precision accuracy PaCO2 measurement GEM Premier 3000are 1 mmHg 0.15 mmHg , respectively . Our minor outcome oxygenation efficacy patient 's comfort three nasal cannula . The arterial partial oxygen pressure ( PaO2 ) measure ( GEM Premier 3000 , Instrumentation Laboratory , Lexington , MA ) nasal cannula . Patients rate comfort level 10-cm visual analogue scale ( VAS ) nasal cannula .
